result.title: Number of Shortest Supersequences
result.content:
Given two strings s and t. Find the number of ways to make a new string c such that both s and t appear as subsequences in c and also c has minimum length among all such strings possible.

I was able to figure out that the shortest length will be len(s) + len(t) â€” len(lcs(s, t)) but unable to approach further via any recursive/combinatorial approach.
